trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several layout-oriented user interface (UI) properties on an associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供編輯器控制項，可讓使用者編輯相關聯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項上的數個配置導向的使用者介面 (UI) 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the layout of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>類別是衍生自的編輯器控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>類別，並會用來編輯會影響配置相關聯的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone.
trans-unit.target: 就像 Web 組件控制項集合中有工具導向的區域 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>類別概觀)、 有工具導向組件控制項 （工具組件），且每個工具組件必須位在特定類型的工具區域。

trans-unit.source: Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics:
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項集合中的工具組件具有兩個特殊的特性：

trans-unit.source: They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 它們是 helper 控制項，可讓使用者以個人化 Web 組件頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: They are visible only in certain display modes.
trans-unit.target: 它們會顯示只在特定的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項是一種工具的部分，變成可見的只有在 Web 組件頁面處於編輯模式，且時特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>已選取要編輯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項，如同所有其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制，位於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>只能包含區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項不能放在任何其他類型的區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> class has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A> property, which gets or sets the title for a layout control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>類別具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>屬性，取得或設定版面配置控制項的標題。

trans-unit.source: The class also has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A> property, which overrides the base property and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此類別也具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A>屬性，它會覆寫基底屬性，並傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control is always visible when the page is in edit mode, even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項一律會顯示當頁面處於編輯模式，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>正在編輯的控制項設為`false`。

trans-unit.source: In other words, users can always edit the properties in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, even if a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control cannot be edited by the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，使用者可以編輯中的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項，即使指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>其他不能編輯控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> class also has two important methods, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, which it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class and overrides.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>類別也有兩個重要的方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>，它繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>類別並覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited.
trans-unit.target: 方法非常重要，因為它們可讓取得和設定的編輯器控制項的欄位值和屬性之間的屬性值上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制所編輯。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:layouteditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項應該使用頁面持續性格式，藉由宣告`<asp:layouteditorpart>`元素內`<zonetemplate>`元素，又包含由`<asp:editorzone>`網頁上的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項可讓終端使用者編輯的下列 UI 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項：

trans-unit.source: To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 若要編輯其他屬性和行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，您可以使用其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>提供 Web 組件控制項集合的控制項。

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 這些控制項包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>、 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項應該提供編輯所需的大部分編輯功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，但您也可以建立自訂編輯器控制項繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>類別。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: To improve accessibility, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: 若要改善存取範圍，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>內呈現控制項`<fieldset>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: `<fieldset>`項目群組的一組相關的使用中進行編輯的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項，以及它協助視覺化使用者代理程式 （例如一般的網頁瀏覽器） 和語音導向使用者代理程式 （在這些控制項之間的索引標籤式瀏覽例如，螢幕讀取軟體）。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此控制項呈現標記可能不符合協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declare a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制在網頁上，並讓它編輯有幾項 UI 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The code example has three parts:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含三個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, which is used to edit the layout properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: 網頁包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項，用來編輯配置屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入瀏覽器中的，此範例的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: It contains a declarative reference to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, with a child `<zonetemplate>` element that contains declarative references to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 它包含的宣告式參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控制項和子系`<zonetemplate>`包含宣告式參考的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Note that the page also contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control that is bound to the Pubs database; because this control resides in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone, it functions as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that can be edited by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個頁面也包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>已繫結控制項至 Pubs 資料庫; 因為此控制項位於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>區域，它是做為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可以編輯的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing.
trans-unit.target: 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）**作者清單 web 組件**控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**開始編輯。

trans-unit.source: When the editing UI is visible, you can see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, and a button and text box positioned above it.
trans-unit.target: 顯示編輯的 UI 時，您可以看到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項，以及位於其上方的按鈕和文字方塊的方塊。

trans-unit.source: If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您進行一些變更中編輯 UI 按一下**套用** 按鈕，您可以使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式，並查看完整的編輯變更影響的下拉式清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 建立類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.%23ctor%2A>建構函式是預設值，則沒有建構函式宣告中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>類別，因此沒有特殊的工作會執行建立類別的新執行個體時。

trans-unit.source: Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control to a page declaratively at design time.
trans-unit.target: 通常您不需要使用建構函式，因為您可以加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項以宣告方式在設計階段的頁面。

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control programmatically for some reason, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您需要加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項以程式設計方式基於某些原因，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart" /> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 將值從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart" /> 控制項儲存至相關聯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項中相應的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the action of saving values from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart" /> control to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果將值從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart" /> 控制項儲存至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的動作順利進行，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則 (如果發生錯誤) 為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法是關鍵的方法上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 方法的目的是要儲存的使用者已設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>中相關聯的對應屬性的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在參考相關聯的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項的繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method from your own code.
trans-unit.target: 您不能呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>從自己的程式碼的方法。

trans-unit.source: However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control provides, you can create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control and provide your own implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您需要編輯不同的程序需以程式設計方式控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制屬性比<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>提供控制項，您可以建立自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制，並提供這個方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method attempts to set the following properties on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法會嘗試設定下列的屬性相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法在使用者按一下按鈕，表示確定或編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 中套用動詞命令時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when setting the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState" /> property on the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在相關聯 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState" /> 控制項上設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 屬性的值時，發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫繼承自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> 控制項的基底屬性，並從設計工具隱藏該屬性，防止它受主題的影響。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button" /> control that receives the default focus in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含收到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button" /> 控制項中預設焦點之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> 控制項的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: 雖然它是公用的，但這個屬性僅用於此控制項的預設呈現，而不可以從開發人員程式碼進行呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出當與控制項相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項處於編輯模式時，是否應該顯示該控制項。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否應該顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A> property returns `true` even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property is `false` on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A>屬性會傳回`true`即使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>屬性是`false`上相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This is so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control can always be available in edit mode, even when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control cannot be edited by the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 這是讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項一律可在編輯模式中使用，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>其他不能編輯控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control and assigns them to the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的屬性值，並將它們指派給相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>方法是關鍵的方法上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the child controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: 它會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>基底類別的方法會擷取目前的值從相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，以及更新中的子控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>具有這些值，讓使用者編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>方法呼叫時中相關聯的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項可能已變更。

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>區域，其中包含控制呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>方法後立即呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法，使中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項一律會同步處理中的值相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Another case where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is initially entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 另一種情況其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>方法呼叫時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項一開始會進入編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Although you can call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges" /> method from your code, it is not necessary to do so.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges" />您的程式碼的方法，不需要執行這項操作。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set calls this method and the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges" /> method at the proper times in the editing process to keep editing controls synchronized with their associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項集合會呼叫這個方法和<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges" />與及其相關聯的方法，在編輯控制項編輯的處理序中適當的時間同步處理<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定編輯器控制項的標題。

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: 做為控制項標題的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 Web 組件控制項集合所提供的計算控制項名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A> property value is displayed in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>屬性值會顯示在標題列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制控制項時顯示在編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 控制項在頁面中宣告時，您可以設定的值`Title`屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未提供標題的值，特定文化特性的預設值用來描述此控制項可讓使用者編輯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to set the title on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control declaratively in a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼示範如何在設定標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>以宣告方式在網頁中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The next part of the code example shows how to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下一個部分的程式碼範例示範如何設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing.
trans-unit.target: 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）**作者清單 web 組件**控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**開始編輯。

trans-unit.source: When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, and a button and text box positioned above it.
trans-unit.target: 編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項，以及位於其上方的按鈕和文字方塊的方塊。

trans-unit.source: Note that the title of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control is the value assigned to it in the declarative markup of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項是在網頁上的宣告式標記指派給它的值。

trans-unit.source: If you enter some text in the text box next to the **Update EditorPart Title** button, and then click the button, the title for the control is updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果您輸入一些文字在文字方塊旁邊**更新 EditorPart 標題**按鈕，然後再按一下按鈕標題的控制項也會更新。
